page.title: 10ORGANISATIONS IN PLYMTREE
page.content: Perhaps the longest running associ- ation is the WOMEN'S INSTITUTE which celebrates its sixtieth birthday this year. The MOTHERS' UNION has also been running for many years. Both these are part of world wide organisations as is the BROWNIES which meets each week. A MOTHER & TODDLER GROUP meets weekly & membership increases annually. There is a PLAYGROUP which runs 3 times a week for children under 5 in Plymtree & neighbouring areas. The School runs a CHESS CLUB & a MUSIC CLUB in term time. The Church & Chapel run a SUNDAY SCHOOL & a YOUTH CLUB. THE SOCIAL CLUB includes a BADMINTON CLASS & a COUNTRY DANCING CLASS. There is a SKITTLE TEAM & an award-winning BELLRINGING TEAM. FRIENDS OF PLYMTREE SCHOOL run many social activities.THE PARISH COUNCIL, PAROCHIAL CHURCH COUNCIL & PLYMTREE VILLAGE COMMUNITY TRUST also exist.
